com.marginallyclever.robotoverlord.dhRobot.solvers

Class DHIKSolver_SCARA

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.marginallyclever.robotoverlord.dhRobot.DHIKSolver
      • com.marginallyclever.robotoverlord.dhRobot.solvers.DHIKSolver_SCARA

  • public class DHIKSolver_SCARA
extends DHIKSolver
    Solves Inverse Kinematics for a SCARA, serially-linked robot.
    Author:
    Dan Royer See https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xdOe4_WYzgU
